evidence.text:
Person B: I'll miss you.
Person A: Don't help her--                Don't help me--

Person A: Wait, what?
Person A: Or yours. I just need to find my room.
Person A: Oh Nessa-- I'm so sorry--
Person B: Oh Nessa...! I had a feeling Avaric was interested!

Person B: Well-- good! I just thought--
Person A: He said he was too shy to ask me, at first, but then, Galinda emboldened him--
Person B: What? Galinda?!
Person A: Don't! Don't you dare say another word against her! I'm about to have the happiest night of my life, thanks to Galinda!
Person B: Father! I-- I never dreamed--
Person B: And Dulcibear! How are you?
